title: Area code  758
description: Area code  758 is the local telephone area code of Saint Lucia. The  758 area code, or "(SLU)", was created during a split from the original  809 area code which began permissive dialing on  1 July  1996 and ended  1 January  1997.
history: The  758 area code, or "(SLU)", was created during a split from the original  809 area code which began permissive dialing on  1 July  1996 and ended  1 January  1997.
callingProcedure: When in Saint Lucia, use the seven digits alone. When calling to Saint Lucia from anywhere in the United States or Canada simply dial  1 (758) + seven digit phone number.

references.source: FaxUSA: A Directory of Facsimile Numbers for Businesses and Organizations Nationwide
